name: Brandon A Welsh
bio: Javascript is the first line of defense! Reach out to me and get in touch with any questions or collaborations, I love to network and help.

name: Bethany Garcia
bio: Instigator. Chaser of shiny objects. Javascript relationship status:  It's complicated.

name: Byron Anderson
bio: Javascript is the language I get to use without asking, so I get to pick and choose to just use 'The Good Parts'!

name: Benjamin Earl
bio: Javascript is my native language, still working on my English.

name: Stuart Taylor
bio: Tell me and I forget, teach me and I may remember, involve me and I learn.

name: Michael Plotke
bio: I'm paid to write JavaScript. I mostly enjoy it. I also enjoy teaching. Exercism is a nice convergence.

name: Rob Kendal
bio: I have 15+ years development experience and I love to learn and share knowledge. Anything front-end, JavaScript and React!

name: Ben Taylor
bio: I love tinkering, making cool things, and teaching. JS Developer for over 7 years, learner & teacher forever.

name: Billie Ko
bio: I'm a JavaScript and functional programming fanboy.

name: Bart Kalanski
bio: If you want to learn something, read about it. If you want to understand something, write about it. If you want to master something, teach it, so here I am :)

name: Bassel Kanso
bio: I occasionally write about software development and design, I consume Javascript daily and mentor people cause it's fun!
